xtce:Parameter.name: VERSION
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: CCSDS Packet Version Number

xtce:Parameter.name: TYPE
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: CCSDS Packet Type Indicator

xtce:Parameter.name: SEC_HDR_FLG
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: CCSDS Packet Secondary Header Flag

xtce:Parameter.name: PKT_APID
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: CCSDS Packet Application Process ID

xtce:Parameter.name: SEG_FLGS
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: CCSDS Packet Grouping Flags

xtce:Parameter.name: SRC_SEQ_CTR
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: CCSDS Packet Sequence Count

xtce:Parameter.name: PKT_LEN
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: CCSDS Packet Length

xtce:Parameter.name: SHCOARSE
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: CCSDS Secondary Header MET

xtce:Parameter.name: START_A
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Electron, anode A, single

xtce:Parameter.name: START_C
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Electron, anode C, single

xtce:Parameter.name: STOP_B0
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Ion, anode B0, single

xtce:Parameter.name: STOP_B3
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Ion, anode B3, single

xtce:Parameter.name: TOF0
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Electron anode A / Ion anode B0, TOF0

xtce:Parameter.name: TOF1
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Electron anode C / Ion anode B3, TOF1

xtce:Parameter.name: TOF2
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Electron anode A / Ion anode C, TOF2

xtce:Parameter.name: TOF3
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Ion anode B0 / Ion anode B3, TOF3

xtce:Parameter.name: TOF0_TOF1
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Electron anode A / Ion anode B0 Electron anode C / Ion anode B3

xtce:Parameter.name: TOF0_TOF2
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Electron anode A / Ion anode B0 Electron anode A / Electron anode C

xtce:Parameter.name: TOF1_TOF2
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Electron anode C / Ion anode B3 Electron anode A / Electron anode C

xtce:Parameter.name: SILVER_TRIPLE
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Electron anode A / Ion anode B0 Electron anode C / Ion anode B3 Electron anode A / Electron anode C Ion anode B0 / Ion anode B3

xtce:Parameter.name: DISC_TOF0
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: TOF0 value less than TOF0 threshold setting

xtce:Parameter.name: DISC_TOF1
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: TOF1 value less than TOF1 threshold setting

xtce:Parameter.name: DISC_TOF2
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: TOF2 value less than TOF2 threshold setting

xtce:Parameter.name: DISC_TOF3
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: TOF3 value less than TOF3 threshold setting

xtce:Parameter.name: POS0
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: ion_anode_b0 (ICE derived from TOF3 based on LUT for B0, 1, 2 and 3)

xtce:Parameter.name: POS1
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: ion_anode_b1 (ICE derived from TOF3 based on LUT for B0, 1, 2 and 3)

xtce:Parameter.name: POS2
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: ion_anode_b2 (ICE derived from TOF3 based on LUT for B0, 1, 2 and 3)

xtce:Parameter.name: POS3
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: ion_anode_b3 (ICE derived from TOF3 based on LUT for B0, 1, 2 and 3)

xtce:Parameter.name: HYDROGEN
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Hydrogen species histogram

xtce:Parameter.name: OXYGEN
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Oxygen species histogram

xtce:Parameter.name: CHKSUM
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: 16-bit CRC checksum
